name: Filetektive
description:
Filetektiv is a short detective game. You must find the culprit in a mess of names and files. Search for keywords to get the new documents you need to crack the case.

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2021

Controls:
Search Keywords to find evidence (Try "Case")
Left Click to move files.
Right Click to inspect files. 
Tab to mess up your desk.

You can view a PDF on the full playthrough here
Although it's better to beat the game without a guide, feel free to use it if you ever get stuck and frustrated.
